item.title: How Codebases Become Spaghetti – Dev Leader Weekly 67
item.description: The post How Codebases Become Spaghetti – Dev Leader Weekly 67 appeared first on Dev Leader.Welcome to another issue of Dev Leader Weekly! In this issue, I discuss how codebases grow in complexity with an example -- AND what to do! The post How Codebases Become Spaghetti – Dev Leader Weekly 67 appeared first on Dev Leader. Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2024/10/26/how-codebases-become-spaghetti-dev-leader-weekly-67/
